title: LYFE Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened Feb 2013, it's the second location of this healthier eating concept restaurant, co-founded by former McDonald's executive with menu co-created by vegan chef Tal Ronen. Offers vegetarian and vegan choices, such as vegan veggie burger, flatbread with vegan cheese, salads, hummus, and even vegan dessert. Selection of beverages made with fruit.
